page.title: 12CUSTOMS_FLORA DANCE
page.content: { {The Flora Dance Every year Perranporth School, Goonhavern School and Mithian School dance the Flora dance through the streets of Perranporth.The Flora dance is a folk dance of Cornwall.It originated in Helston to celebrate May Day.Our School does the dance with the older children in pairs.As we dance money is collected for the carnival. We asked the Headmaster ,Mr.Kayes what he thought of the Flora dance.He said, "They were doing well and they had smiling faces." We asked him whether the Flora dance was worthwhile.He said "Yes,Ithink it helps the community."
